# Audirefunglets
## Overview
Audirefunglets are the wise shepherds of the fungal forests.

## Traits
***Ability Score Increase.*** Your Wisdom score increases by 2.

***Mushroom Whisperer.*** You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with fungi, plants and molds. The knowledge and awareness of many these things is limited by their intelligence, but at minimum, they can give you information about nearby locations and monsters, including whatever they can perceive or have perceived within the past day. You might be able to persuade a beast to perform a small favor for you, at the GMâ€™s discretion.
